steps.description: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on cutting board
steps.modified_description: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on a plate

errors.description: Use a plate instead of a cutting board

steps.description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping it with a paper towel
scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar
steps.modified_description: (Spill)scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar

steps.description: Spread-Spread jelly over the nut butter
Clean-Clean the knife by wiping with a paper towel
steps.modified_description: not enough, Clean-Clean the knife by wiping with a paper towel

errors.description: Leave some jelly on the knife - unhyginic

steps.description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps, but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.modified_description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 2 inches thick.

errors.description: There will be gaps in this case

steps.description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 5 toothpicks about 1 inch apart
steps.modified_description: Original Description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 3 toothpicks

steps.description: Slide-Slide floss under the tortilla, perpendicular to the length of the roll
Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the butter knife, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll
steps.modified_description: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the butter knife till the end toothpicks

errors.description: Trim too much. The toothpicks will be at the corner of the end pinwheels

steps.description: Place-Place the floss halfway between toothpicks
steps.modified_description: Place-Place the knife halfway between toothpicks

errors.description: Use a knife instead of floss

steps.description: Cross-Cross the floss's two ends over the tortilla roll's top

errors.description: Since we are using a knife we don't need to perform this step

steps.description: pull-pull the floss ends in opposite directions to slice
steps.modified_description: Cut-Cut the pinwheels in irregular shapes

errors.description: Cut the pinwheels in irregular shapes - Not perpendicular

steps.description: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
Place-Place the pinwheels on a plate

errors.description: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla, leaving 1/2-inch uncovered at the edges
scoop-Use a butter knife to scoop nut butter from the jar
